name: Wormball (Chris Wade)
description:
Wormball is a local multiplayer game about consensually worm wrestling everyone in the room. It's meant to be played with a large group in front of an even larger screen.

I'm still working on Wormball and it will eventually be part of a small bundle of minimalist games.

In the latest version I've added the following features:
- Support for up to 8 players
- Character customization
- Beak clashing

Get in touch if you want to chat or know more about the game:
www.christopherwade.co
@cjacobwade
